name: resize-at-edge
description: A service to resize images on Lambda@Edge shared between multiple projects

scripts.install-aws-sharp: rm -rf node_modules/sharp && SHARP_IGNORE_GLOBAL_LIBVIPS=1 npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux sharp
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run install-aws-sharp && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run install-aws-sharp && serverless deploy --stage production
